title: (x) "Eileen Ng" simple geometric sans - ITC Avant Garde Gothic {Mike Y}
content:
What is the name of the font, thank you very much in advance

Best Regards

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808232433im_/http:/typophile.com/files/contohabc.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Sans serif on window - TheSans {Dino}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808232433/http:/typophile.com/node/19144 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) It's like being caught in a hail storm of mint imperials - Berthold Block {Dav, Alexey} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808232433/http:/typophile.com/node/19140 "Go to next forum topic")
author: contohabc

comments.content:
I say, [this gentleman can’t read English](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808232433/http:/typophile.com/node/19141). I’m boycotting his requests. There, said it!  
(How annoying!!! It feels like it’s a one-way only communication. Anyway, I have better things to do.)

If this is really the sample that you want ID’d then this is [Avant Garde Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808232433/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-avant-garde-gothic/).

Miguel, I understand your impatience, but I think ’contohabc’ has been trying, politely, to get our help, in spite of a language barrier.

- Mike Yanega
